Class MasterConnector

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.gaskov.prime.inspector.worker.MasterConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class MasterConnector extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Manages discovery and communication with the master node.
